Портал 1 это игра которая захватывает своим интересным мотивом где вам прийдется либо доверять главной машине Глад или же не доверять и проходить до конца! Сама игра как головоломка очень трудна, но на каждый уровень максимум я потратил лишь 20 минут.Мне игра понравилась и  я остался довольным, советую всем поиграть и не пожалеть денег ведь сейчас еще скидочки.

I got this gem on a winter sale many years ago. I was curious because i saw many references on reddit back then. This game took me by surprise. Immediately bought Portal 2 afterwards. Short game which doesnt feel short, enormously fun, amazing humor, a clever game. Definetily one of the best video games of all-times, easly.
One of the best experiences Ive ever had in gaming history. I would play it again again and again. There is no stopping of fun. Its the most intense puzzle game ive played

Будучи в 2021 открыв эту игру впервые, в то же мгновение она и проходится. Большинство знают только её будущего апостола [u] Portal 2[/u] как и я. Игра замечательная! Сюжетная линия проходиться за ~3 часа. Головоломки не сложные, для 2007 года игра выглядит приятно даже сейчас. Вишенка на [i] торте [/i] - титры в конце игры.
[b] We do what we must
because, we can
For the good of all of us
except for the ones who are dead.
But there's no sense crying over every mistake
You just keep on trying 'till you run out of cake [/b]

I've had this game on my radar for years, attempted to start it a few times but never saw it fully through until now. Even in 2021, it holds up. Graphics are solid, puzzles scale in challenge consistently, dialogue is entertaining, not overly lengthy, final act delivers well. I cant say I have any complaints. Worth a play through.

I think Portal is a great game that gives a very satisfying experience. The game has an original and fresh premise with impressive mechanics. It features loads of puzzling levels that force the player to think outside the box to progress. Although most of the levels have relatively simple solutions, it is possible to get stuck on a particularly tricky level which can occasionally be frustrating. However, completing the game feels very rewarding, with a fantastic ending. A mysterious storyline holds the game together with engaging plot twists and occasional clever humour that really makes the game full of fun. The only negative is that the game may not take very long to complete and makes me wish there was more levels.
